name: Super Mario Bros. S - The All-Stars Update
name_original: Super Mario Bros. S - The All-Stars Update
description:
Super Mario Bros. S is a collaborative fangame, meant to embody the spirit of modern Super Mario platformers while utilizing the style of older titles.

The next version of Super Mario Bros. S is here, introducing the main campaign! Play though the first half of the revamped world 1. As a series-first, you can even switch your gamestyle between the NES and SNES versions of Super Mario Bros. Road to Infinity also returns from v0.0.1, with new powerups, enemies, and improvements!

Features:

  • The first half of world 1 is now here!
  • Two themes: Classic and All-Stars
  • Improved physics
  • 12 moons to find - 3 hidden in each level
  • Three playable characters  with different abilities
  • More robust controller support
  • Automatic saving
  • Improved Road to Infinity gamemode

Controls and credits are listed in-game.
